includedAssets.title: Run
includedAssets.synopsis: An FBI recruit from Quantico Base is forced to go on the run as she is hunted for her alleged role in a terrorist bombing.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: In the past, the FBI's newest recruits report for training at Quantico Base. In the present, one of the brightest graduates is suspected of masterminding a terrorist attack. Tense thriller starring Priyanka Chopra.
